subject: Proposal for appointment of Safety Consultant and Proof Consultant by the Contractor in EPC Projects
text: HR 7e&THrf  yifachrut 3T414 Phone 91-11 25074100/25074200 (83; qart a Tatf 741a) T7v Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry 0f Road Transport and Highways) #-5 Vi 6, W4-10, &A, #Rrtm-110075 G-5 & 6.Secton-10,Dwarka New Delhi110075 No,11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 02.03.2016 PQLICY MAIIERS-Iechnical (20022016) (Decision taken on FileNo NHAVPhase-WBiGuLHun2015l Sub: Proposal for appointment of Safety Consultant and Proof Consultant by the Contractor in EPC Projects For  decentralizing and strengthening the field level   operations in NHAI, Regional Offices have been set Up in different States. Also, Regional Officers have been empowered with certain duties and responsibilities for early decisions as well as expeditious execution of the projects under their jurisdictions. 2. It is stipulated as per Article 10 of EPC Contract that the Contractor is required to appoint the Safety Consultant and Proof Consultant along with their Key Personnel from panel of 3 firms out of which Authority has to choose one firm: 3 It has been observed that such proposals are being referred to NHAI HQ on which a considerable time is taken to give the consent of the Authority . This leads to delay in deployment of such consultants and adversely impacls the progress of the project: 4 In this regard, it is decided that for appointment of Safety Consultant and Proof Consultant (along with Iheir personnei) by the Contractor as per Article-10 of EPC Agreement, the concerned Regional Officer is hereby delegated the power to act on behalf of the Authority for according necessary consent following the stipulations of the contract agreement. 5 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. (A.K Sadhu) CGM (Coord:) To: All Ofticers & Employees of HQ/ROs] PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices. Reg: key
